entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:34 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -38.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
